de.esoco.lib.comm

Class CommunicationRelationTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.comm.CommunicationRelationTypes

  • public class CommunicationRelationTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains standard relation type definitions for the communications framework.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> BUFFER_SIZE

    • Field Detail

      • ENDPOINT

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<Endpoint> ENDPOINT
        A reference to a communication endpoint.

      • ENDPOINT_ADDRESS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> ENDPOINT_ADDRESS
        The address of a communication endpoint (typically some kind of URI). This type is final so that it cannot be changed after it has been set.

      • ENDPOINT_SOCKET

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.net.Socket> ENDPOINT_SOCKET
        A relation type to store an endpoint socket.

      • SOCKET_INPUT_STREAM

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.io.InputStream> SOCKET_INPUT_STREAM
        A relation type to store the input stream of a socket.

      • SOCKET_OUTPUT_STREAM

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.io.OutputStream> SOCKET_OUTPUT_STREAM
        A relation type to store the output stream of a socket.

      • SOCKET_READER

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.io.Reader> SOCKET_READER
        A relation type to store a reader for a socket input stream.

      • SOCKET_WRITER

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.io.PrintWriter> SOCKET_WRITER
        A relation type to store a writer for a socket input stream.

      • REQUEST_ENCODING

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.nio.charset.Charset> REQUEST_ENCODING
        Defines the character encoding of a request. Has a default value of StandardCharsets.UTF_8.

      • RESPONSE_ENCODING

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.nio.charset.Charset> RESPONSE_ENCODING
        Defines the character encoding of a response. Has a default value of StandardCharsets.UTF_8.

      • USER_NAME

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> USER_NAME
        A user name for the authentication on a communication endpoint.

      • PASSWORD

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> PASSWORD
        A password for the authentication on a communication endpoint.

      • LAST_REQUEST

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> LAST_REQUEST
        Contains a string description of the most recent request that has been performed in a network operation.

      • REQUEST_HISTORY

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> REQUEST_HISTORY
        An automatic relation that collects the values of LAST_REQUEST. Should be annotated with StandardTypes.MAXIMUM to limit the history size.

      • REQUEST_HANDLING_TIME

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> REQUEST_HANDLING_TIME
        Contains the time (in milliseconds) that the handling of a request has consumed.

      • CONNECTION_TIMEOUT

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
        The timeout in milliseconds after which an attempt of a network connection will be interrupted. Defaults to 60 seconds (i.e. 60,000 milliseconds).

      • MAX_CONNECTIONS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> MAX_CONNECTIONS
        The maximum number of (concurrent) connections to or from a communication component.

      • MAX_REQUEST_SIZE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> MAX_REQUEST_SIZE
        The maximum size that a request to a server allowed to have. Has a default value of 64 KiB.

      • MAX_RESPONSE_SIZE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> MAX_RESPONSE_SIZE
        The maximum size that the response of an endpoint communication is allowed to have. Has a default value of 1 MiB.

      • BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> BUFFER_SIZE
        The buffer size to be used when communicating over an endpoint connection. Default value is 8 KiB.

      • ENCRYPTION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Boolean> ENCRYPTION
        A flag that indicates that a connection performs encrypted communication like SSL, TLS, or SSH. Declared as final to prevent changes after initialization.

      • TRUST_SELF_SIGNED_CERTIFICATES

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Boolean> TRUST_SELF_SIGNED_CERTIFICATES
        A flag to enabled SSL/TLS connections to endpoints that use self-signed certificates. ATTENTION: this should only be used for test environments, not for production systems.

      • HTTP_STATUS_CODE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<HttpStatusCode> HTTP_STATUS_CODE
        The status code of an HTTP request. Will be available in a connection after an HTTP request has been executed.

      • HTTP_MAX_HEADER_LINE_SIZE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> HTTP_MAX_HEADER_LINE_SIZE
        The maximum size of a line in an HTTP request header . Has a default value of 8 KiB.

      • HTTP_REQUEST_METHOD

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<HttpRequestMethod> HTTP_REQUEST_METHOD
        The method of an HTTP request.

      • HTTP_REQUEST_PATH

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<HttpRequestMethod> HTTP_REQUEST_PATH
        The target path of an HTTP request.

      • HTTP_REQUEST_HEADERS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> HTTP_REQUEST_HEADERS
        The headers for an HTTP request. These must be set on a connection or endpoint instance before a request is executed.

      • HTTP_RESPONSE_HEADERS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> HTTP_RESPONSE_HEADERS
        The headers of the response to an HTTP request. Will be available in a connection after an HTTP request has been executed. The contents is a mapping from header names to a list of header values in the order in which they are returned by URLConnection.getHeaderFields().

      • PROXY_HOST

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> PROXY_HOST
        The host name of a proxy server.

      • PROXY_PORT

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Integer> PROXY_PORT
        The port of a proxy server.

      • PROXY_USER

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> PROXY_USER
        The optional user name for the connection to a proxy server.

      • PROXY_PASSWORD

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> PROXY_PASSWORD
        The optional password for the connection to a proxy server.
